history.proof: intros A B M O H1 H2. unfold isocele in H1, H2. shelve.

ctx: intros A B M O H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce R to an evaluable reference.

ctx: intros A B M O H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply (double_permute (cons (vec B M) (vec B A)) (double (cons (vec A B) (vec A M))) pi).
exceptions.exn: In environment A, B, M, O : PO H1 : R (cons (vec M A) (vec M O)) (cons (vec A O) (vec A M)) H2 : R (cons (vec M B) (vec M O)) (cons (vec B O) (vec B M)) The term "cons (vec B M) (vec B A)" has type "AV" while it is expected to have type "R (double (cons ?u ?v)) (double (cons ?w ?t))".

ctx: intros A B M O H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A, B, M, O : PO H1 : R (cons (vec M A) (vec M O)) (cons (vec A O) (vec A M)) H2 : R (cons (vec M B) (vec M O)) (cons (vec B O) (vec B M)) The term "B" has type "PO" while it is expected to have type "isocele ?A ?B ?C".

ctx: intros A B M O H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A, B, M, O : PO H1 : R (cons (vec M A) (vec M O)) (cons (vec A O) (vec A M)) H2 : R (cons (vec M B) (vec M O)) (cons (vec B O) (vec B M)) The term "B" has type "PO" while it is expected to have type "isocele ?A ?B ?C".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall A B M O : PO, isocele O M A -> isocele O M B -> R (double (cons (vec M A) (vec M B))) (cons (vec O A) (vec O B))

Premises:
*** [ R : AV -> AV -> Prop ]
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
isocele = fun A B C : PO => R (cons (vec B C) (vec B A)) (cons (vec C A) (vec C B)) : PO -> PO -> PO -> Prop
*** [ PO : Type ]
*** [ vec : PO -> PO -> V ]
double = fun a : AV => plus a a : AV -> AV
*** [ cons : V -> V -> AV ]
isocele_permute : forall A B C : PO, isocele A B C -> R (plus (cons (vec A C) (vec A B)) (double (cons (vec B A) (vec B C)))) pi
triangle_isocele : forall A B C : PO, isocele A B C -> R (plus (cons (vec A B) (vec A C)) (double (cons (vec B C) (vec B A)))) pi
somme_triangle : forall A B C : PO, R (plus (cons (vec A B) (vec A C)) (plus (cons (vec B C) (vec B A)) (cons (vec C A) (vec C B)))) pi
opp_vect : forall A B : PO, vR (opp (vec A B)) (vec B A)
v_vec : forall (u : V) (A : PO), exists B : PO, vR u (vec A B)
double_permute : forall u v w t : V, R (double (cons u v)) (double (cons w t)) -> R (double (cons v u)) (double (cons t w))
ssrbool.if_expr : forall A : Type, bool -> A -> A -> A
BinInt.Z.le_ind : forall A : BinNums.Z -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall n : BinNums.Z, A n -> (forall m : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le n m -> A m -> A (BinInt.Z.succ m)) -> forall m : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le n m -> A m
non_vide_P : exists A : PO, A = A
Refl.make_impl : forall A : Type, (A -> Prop) -> list A -> Prop -> Prop
orthogonal = fun u v : V => R (double (cons u v)) pi : V -> V -> Prop
colineaire = fun u v : V => R (double (cons u v)) zero : V -> V -> Prop
regulier_cons : forall u v w t s : V, R (cons u v) (cons u w) -> R (cons u t) (cons u s) -> R (cons v t) (cons w s)
reflexion : forall i u v u' v' : V, R (cons u' i) (cons i u) -> R (cons v' i) (cons i v) -> R (cons u v) (cons v' u')
Relation_Definitions.relation = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Relation_Definitions.relation _%type_scope
rotation : forall u v u' v' : V, R (cons u u') (cons v v') -> R (cons u v) (cons u' v')
R_permute : forall u v w t : V, R (cons u v) (cons w t) -> R (cons v u) (cons t w)
vR_R_compatible : forall u u' v v' : V, vR u u' -> vR v v' -> R (cons u v) (cons u' v')
Setoid.Seq_sym : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x y : A, Aeq x y -> Aeq y x
R_double : forall a b : AV, R a b -> R (double a) (double b)
Setoid.Seq_trans : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x y z : A, Aeq x y -> Aeq y z -> Aeq x z
Setoid.Seq_refl : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x : A, Aeq x x
Refl.make_impl_true : forall (A : Type) (eval : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Refl.make_impl eval l True
ssrbool.mem = fun (T : Type) (pT : ssrbool.predType T) => let '{| ssrbool.pred_sort := pred_sort; ssrbool.topred := toP |} as pT0 := pT return (ssrbool.pred_sort pT0 -> ssrbool.mem_pred T) in fun A : ssrbool.pred_sort {| ssrbool.pred_sort := pred_sort; ssrbool.topred := toP |} => ssrbool.Mem (T:=T) (fun x : T => toP A x) : forall (T : Type) (pT : ssrbool.predType T), ssrbool.pred_sort pT -> ssrbool.mem_pred T Arguments ssrbool.mem {T}%type_scope {pT} A : rename, simpl never
Chasles_2 : forall u v w t : V, R (cons u t) (plus (cons u v) (plus (cons v w) (cons w t)))
Chasles : forall u v w : V, R (plus (cons u v) (cons v w)) (cons u w)
permute : forall u v : V, R (plus (cons u v) (cons v u)) zero
plus_zero : forall u v : V, R (plus (cons u v) zero) (cons u v)
oppu_oppv : forall u v : V, R (cons (opp u) (opp v)) (cons u v)
zero_plus : forall u v : V, R (plus zero (cons u v)) (cons u v)
somme_pi : forall u v w : V, R (plus (cons u v) (plus (cons w (opp u)) (cons (opp v) (opp w)))) pi
somme_permute : forall u v w : V, R (plus (cons v u) (plus (cons (opp u) w) (cons (opp w) (opp v)))) pi
u_oppv : forall u v : V, R (cons u (opp v)) (plus (cons u v) pi)
oppu_v : forall u v : V, R (cons (opp u) v) (plus pi (cons u v))
angle_nul : forall u : V, R (cons u u) zero
oppu_u : forall u : V, R (cons (opp u) u) pi
angle_plat : forall u : V, R (cons u (opp u)) pi
double_plus : forall a b : AV, R (double (plus a b)) (plus (double a) (double b))
angle_cons : forall (a : AV) (u : V), exists v : V, R a (cons u v)
Ring_polynom.PEeval : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (BinNums.N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> R

``` 
intros A B M O H1 H2.
unfold isocele in H1, H2.
unfold R at 1.
apply (double_permute (cons (vec B M) (vec B A)) (double (cons (vec A B) (vec A M))) pi).
apply (isocele_permute B M A). assumption.
apply (isocele_permute B M A). assumption.
```

original: intros A B M O H1 H2. unfold isocele in H1, H2. unfold R at 1. apply (double_permute (cons (vec B M) (vec B A)) (double (cons (vec A B) (vec A M))) pi). apply (isocele_permute B M A). auto. apply (isocele_permute B M A). auto.
